name: SetGithubActionsCachePolicy
description:
Set GitHub Actions cache usage policy for an enterprise.

This tool sets the cache usage policy for GitHub Actions within a specific enterprise. Requires authentication with an access token having `admin:enterprise` scope or an appropriate GitHub App permission.

parameters.name: enterprise_identifier
parameters.description: The slug or ID of the enterprise for which to set the cache policy.

value_schema.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

parameters.name: maximum_repository_cache_size_limit_in_gb
parameters.description: Maximum cache size limit for all repository caches in an enterprise, in gigabytes.

value_schema.description: For repositories in an enterprise, the maximum value that can be set as the limit for the sum of all caches in a repository, in gigabytes.

parameters.name: default_repo_cache_size_limit_gb
parameters.description: Default size limit for all caches in a repository, specified in gigabytes.

value_schema.description: For repositories in an enterprise, the default size limit for the sum of all caches in a repository, in gigabytes.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: enterprise
parameters.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

value_schema.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

parameters.name: max_repo_cache_size_limit_in_gb
parameters.description: For repositories in an enterprise, the maximum value that can be set as the limit for the sum of all caches in a repository, in gigabytes.

value_schema.description: For repositories in an enterprise, the maximum value that can be set as the limit for the sum of all caches in a repository, in gigabytes.

parameters.name: repo_cache_size_limit_in_gb
parameters.description: For repositories in an enterprise, the default size limit for the sum of all caches in a repository, in gigabytes.

value_schema.description: For repositories in an enterprise, the default size limit for the sum of all caches in a repository, in gigabytes.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
